document_data.mainbody: '''''Dungeon'' issue 69''' was released in July/August of 1998. It contained the following articles related to the [[Forgotten Realms]]:

Index.Characters: :[[Amilie]] • [[Arathylar]] • [[Balathel]] • [[Daunzra]] • [[Domino]] • [[Esau Enoch]] • [[Fernastus]] • [[Gharvan]] • [[Gorman]] • [[Hendran]] • [[Hezekiel Wolf]] • [[Jarain]] • [[Lorelle]] • [[Melantha Wolf]] • [[Metedes]] • [[Olothyr]] • [[Rebekah Wolf]] • [[Rurumil]] • [[Shan Hsi]] • Sir [[Justin Melenikus]] • [[Sissiska]]
